item.title: State-level Senior Men's Kho Kho Championship – 2026: Raichur emerges champion, Mysuru runners-up
item.description:
<![CDATA[January 12, 2026
Mysuru: Team Raichur emerged as champions in the two-day State-level Senior Kho Kho Championship – 2026 for Men jointly organised by Karnataka Amateur Kho Kho Association (KAKKA) and Mysuru District Amateur Kho Kho Association (MDAKKA) in memory of late N. Prakash, former President of KAKKA at Vivekananda Grounds in Kuvempunagar, here yesterday.
In the finals, Raichur defeated Mysuru 18-16 to lift coveted trophy. In semi-finals, Raichur defeated Dharwad 15-13 and Mysuru overca...]]>
item.author: Murali Sundararaju
